title: Boxcar Type Help
content:
Need help finding a something similar to "Norfolk and Western" in this image:

[http://lionelllc.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/6-29365\_j611.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150416004037/http:/lionelllc.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/6-29365_j611.jpg "http://lionelllc.files.wordpress.com/2013/01/6-29365\_j611.jpg")

actually, if you guys know of anything similar to the numerals as well it would be awesome

This is my first post on here,  
figured it would be the place to go.

Thanks!
author: tmccoy33
